metadata.title: Waku v2 Ambient Peer Discovery
metadata.name: Waku v2 Ambient Peer Discovery
metadata.author: kaiserd
metadata.summary: Introducing and discussing ambient peer discovery methods currently used by Waku v2, as well as future plans in this area.

metadata.title: Waku Privacy and Anonymity Analysis Part I: Definitions and Waku Relay
metadata.name: Waku Privacy and Anonymity Analysis Part I: Definitions and Waku Relay
metadata.author: kaiserd
metadata.summary: Introducing a basic threat model and privacy/anonymity analysis for the Waku v2 relay protocol.
